name: The Gap (itch) (skooka)
description:
Jules needs your help to find their friends in this confusing place and possible dangerous place.

Made by skooka, for Liam, in the Secret Santa Game Jam.

Happy Holidays :)

Update log

1.1 LATEST: fixed the 2nd area not having the dither effect

Jam version 2: fixed an enemy not killing the player, made respawning more consistent and made the invisible walls disappear when you respawn, fixed inventory items not disappearing when going back to the hub, and added a scripted scare bc why not
